title: OnPage Announces Secure Priority Messaging for Colleges and Universities
text:
OnPage Announces Secure Priority Messaging for Colleges and Universities
Academic institutions leverage OnPage Corporation software on the mobile devices of their faculty, students, administration and operations.
Waltham, MA, October 20, 2015 --( PR.com )-- OnPage IT alert management software enhances security and critical alerts at every level of College and University communications.
System Features:
• Provide IT alerts to support staff round the clock
• Help patients reach University medical staff securely and confidentially
• Outfit all Resident Life Directors in times of emergency
OnPage integrates easily and seamlessly with your existing IT monitoring, campus email systems, and SMS messaging.
Used by thousands of customers worldwide the cloud-based OnPage solution is simple to use, completely secure, and scales to fit your needs.
About OnPage:
OnPage is the industry leading Smartphone application system for Global, High-Priority, Real-Time Enterprise Messaging, Cybersecurity Intrusion Compliance and IT Alert Management. The OnPage application addresses the need for critical and time-sensitive messages.
OnPage takes mobile communications to the next level with the latest all-in-one-app features, including the ability to set priority level for each message to ensure the High-Priority messages receive immediate attention. Additionally, the new web based On-Call scheduling management tool enables enterprise users to plan ahead and route prioritized messages to the right person, on the right day, at the right time.
Thousands of IT Professionals, healthcare providers, doctors, field engineers, law enforcement, nurses, emergency responders and disaster recovery teams depend on OnPage rock solid reliability every day.
Leading corporations, including Blue Chip organizations have adopted OnPage for critical alerts and secure messaging.
For more information visit: onpage.com
